data.title: East London, South Africa
data.meta_description: East London, South Africa - Current temperature and weather conditions. Detailed hourly weather forecast for today - including weather conditions, temperature, pressure, humidity, precipitation, dewpoint, wind, visibility, and UV index data.
data.text:
Weather forecast and temperature for today - Thursday, 29. Aug

06:29

17:49

SAST

Mostly Sunny

17°C / 6°C

Wind: 26km/h SW

Humidity: 49%

Precip. probability: 1%

Precipitation: 0mm

UV index: 5

Today, in East London, mostly sunny weather is anticipated.

The temperature is predicted to vary between a comfortable 17°C (62.6°F) and a frosty 6°C (42.8°F).

The day's high temperature is anticipated to be a couple of degrees lower than the standard peak for August of 20.9°C (69.6°F).

Sunrise will be at 06:29 and sunset at 17:49; the daylight will last for 11h and 20min.

Currently, weather conditions are clear, marked by a cloudless sky.

The temperature is a frosty 9°C (48.2°F), and the apparent temperature is estimated at 6°C (42.8°F). The current temperature is relatively far from today's maximum-forecasted 17°C (62.6°F).

Frequently asked questions

What is the current temperature?

The temperature at 01:35 is 9°C (48.2°F). Feels-like temperature is 6°C (42.8°F).

What is the weather forecast for East London for today?

Today, in East London, mostly bright and sunny weather is expected.

What will be the maximum temperature today?

Today, the highest temperature will be 17°C (62.6°F), while the lowest temperature will be 6°C (42.8°F).

The maximum temperature will be a few degrees lower than the average highest temperature of 20.9°C (69.6°F) in August. The lowest temperature will be significantly lower than the average low of 14.5°C (58.1°F).

When are sunrise and sunset today?

On Thursday, in East London, sunrise will be at 06:29 and sunset at 17:49 (SAST).

How long is the day today?

Today, the daylight will last for 11h and 20min.
